meanings.definition: A type of material made from compressed wood fibers.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used pressboard to build the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The pressboard is strong and durable for construction projects.
meanings.sent3: When the pressboard started talking, everyone was surprised!
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like pressboard, solid and reliable.
meanings.sent5: The pressboard gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing its quality.

meanings.definition: A board made from compressed wood fibers.
meanings.sent1: We bought pressboard to repair the broken cabinet.
meanings.sent2: The pressboard was easy to cut and shape for the project.
meanings.sent3: The pressboard skateboard was a funny sight to see.
meanings.sent4: His words hit me like a pressboard, firm and unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The pressboard displayed intricate patterns, impressing everyone.
